channel.title: When i log into webclient it says loading please wait and cant log in
channel.description: i've made a webclient and it's jarred and signed cache downloader works but when i log in i get this error: [code]Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at Jframe.setCursor(Jframe.java:36) at client.drawTooltip(client.java:9993) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:9362) at client.method146(client.java:12445) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8582) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9291) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4941) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] if someone can help fix that i'd be willing to pay.

item.title: When i log into webclient it says loading please wait and cant log in
item.dc:creator: @terain133 terain133
item.description:
@terain133 wrote:

i’ve made a webclient and it’s jarred and signed cache downloader works but when i log in i get this error:

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at Jframe.setCursor(Jframe.java:36) at client.drawTooltip(client.java:9993) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:9362) at client.method146(client.java:12445) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8582) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9291) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4941) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
if someone can help fix that i’d be willing to pay.

Read full topic
item.source: When i log into webclient it says loading please wait and cant log in
